scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "rm -rf ./app ; go build *.go && ./app"
scripts.deploy: npm run heroku-deploy && git rm -r --cached .idea ; git add . && git commit -am "Deployed Build" && git push
scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-run
scripts.docker-run: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker run -p $npm_package_config_servport:$npm_package_config_servport $npm_package_config_servername && open http://localhost:$npm_package_config_servport
scripts.heroku-deploy: npm run docker-build && npm run heroku-replace ; npm run docker-tag ; npm run dockerhub-push
scripts.heroku-replace: heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servername --confirm $npm_package_config_servername ; git init && heroku create $npm_package_config_servername && heroku container:push web && heroku open && heroku logs
scripts.docker-build: export GOPATH=$HOME/go ; npm run build-client && dep ensure -update && rm -rf ./app ; docker build -t $npm_package_config_servername .
scripts.docker-clean: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) -f ; docker rmi $(docker images -q) -f
scripts.dev-latest: brew update && brew upgrade && brew install dep && brew install git && brew install go && sudo npm install -g npm ; npm run dev-env
scripts.dev-env: npm install && export GOPATH=$HOME/go && export PATH=$PATH:$GOPATH/bin
scripts.dev-github: git init ; git add . ; git commit -m "Init Project"; git remote add origin $npm_package_config_githubprojectname ; git remote -v ; git push -u origin master
